page.title: 13EVERY DAY LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: My name is Sharon Scott and Iam twelve years old. I live in{Pollards {Oak Road}in Hurst Green, Surrey. Everyday I go to school from Monday to Friday, from{9.10}a.m. to 3.40 p.m. Every Monday I go to{Guides}from 7.00 p.m to 8.00 p.m.. On Tuesday and Wednesday I do not do much after school I just help my mother. On a Thursday I sometimes go to bible club where bible stories are told and games are played. On Fridays I can stay and play out longer than usual and I can also finish off homework. On Saturday and Sunday I go out to play with my friends and I also see my Granparents. Most of the time I play with my friend Debbie.
